data.description: handler for Apache-1.3 to avoid compression
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This handler is in public use since 2002. It has been discussed on
    mod_perl mailing list several times. I've ordered name registration
    for this module already 2 times with no luck (confirmation from
    CPAN) though. Please register it for better indexing.

    Thanks, Slava
